name: Let Bions be bygones - Early Demo
name_original: Let Bions be bygones - Early Demo
description:
This is the early demo of the game called "Let Bions be bygones," or shortly LBbb.

LBbb is a dark, future-noir detective story. It is a modern try on a point-and-click game where we move the focus from the boring puzzles and pixel hunts to a strong narrative and rich world, with many choices and different approaches. The graphics are a hybrid combination of 2D pixel art and modern 3D to enchant the atmosphere but still keep your imagination active.

Demo contains the Prologue scene, which showcases some of the gameplay with many different narrative options and outcomes. 

The game is still early in development, and we are a small team, with most of the work done by just one guy. So expect bugs, mistakes, etc. That's also one more reason why all comments and support are very welcome. 

We hope you'll enjoy your experience!
